string.Text: Closed captions. Press the spacebar to toggle captions on and off.
Skip navigation. Press enter to return to the slide.

links.slidetitle: Instructions:  Select the best answer for each question.
links.displaytext: Instructions:  Select the best answer for each question.

links.slidetitle: 1. The central objective of communication is the transmission of meaning.
links.displaytext: 1. The central objective of communication is the transmission of meaning.

links.slidetitle: 2. Good writers spend most of their time on the revising phase of the 3-x-3 writing process.
links.displaytext: 2. Good writers spend most of their time on the revising phase of the 3-x-3 writing process.

links.slidetitle: 3. Skilled business communicators use an abundance of first-person pronouns such as I, we, and our to connect with an audience.
links.displaytext: 3. Skilled business communicators use an abundance of first-person pronouns such as I, we, and our to connect with an audience.

links.slidetitle: 4. Every mechanic must submit his time sheet by Friday is a well-written sentence.
links.displaytext: 4. Every mechanic must submit his time sheet by Friday is a well-written sentence.

links.slidetitle: 5. Use the indirect strategy when your audience may be uninterested, unwilling, hostile, or displeased.
links.displaytext: 5. Use the indirect strategy when your audience may be uninterested, unwilling, hostile, or displeased.

links.slidetitle: 6. Active-voice verbs are preferred in business writing.
links.displaytext: 6. Active-voice verbs are preferred in business writing.

links.slidetitle: 7. You should strive to write paragraphs with eight or fewer printed lines.
links.displaytext: 7. You should strive to write paragraphs with eight or fewer printed lines.

links.slidetitle: 8. “I am sending this message to let you know that Tuesday's meeting has been cancelled” is a concise and direct message.
links.displaytext: 8. “I am sending this message to let you know that Tuesday's meeting has been cancelled” is a concise and direct message.

links.slidetitle: 9. Well-designed documents increase readability and audience comprehension.
links.displaytext: 9. Well-designed documents increase readability and audience comprehension.

links.slidetitle: 10. To save time, you should thoroughly proofread a document as you write it.
links.displaytext: 10. To save time, you should thoroughly proofread a document as you write it.
